vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ναγγαί, ὁ
indecl.,
Naggai: Luk.3:25.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time ofExile and return, only mentioned at Luk.3.25;
son of: Maath (G3092);
father of: Esli (G2069)
§ Naggai, Nagge, (Proper name), indeclinable, Lk. 3:25*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
拿該 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "照亮的"
基督的祖先 (路 3:25)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
拿该 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "照亮的"
基督的祖先 (路 3:25)
